p: The aim of this study were to evaluate FEe in dogs with PH. Study‐population was grouped as follow: 1) dogs with acute adrenal insufficiency (AAI), dogs treated for PH (TD) [both with fludrocortisone and desoxycorticosterone pivalate (DOCP)] 2) dogs with PH treated with DOCP classified as well controlled ([Na] and [K] in the RI), under‐controlled (hyponatremia and/or hyperkalemia) and over‐controlled (hypernatremia and/or hypokalemia), respectively 3) dogs well controlled classified based on drug administration's timing: 9‐15, 23‐27 and 28‐33 days after DOCP injection, respectively.
